channel.title: Always Error Message
channel.description: Yeah, I always get the "Error connecting to server" message. It says to cancel and re start it, but I can't do it, it always repeats itself. How do I fix this?

item.title: Always Error Message
item.dc:creator: @Killed_By_Squirrel Killed By Squirrel
item.description:
@Killed_By_Squirrel wrote:

On localhost - 127.0.0.1 or your actual no-ip address?

item.title: Always Error Message

item.title: Always Error Message
item.dc:creator: @Killed_By_Squirrel Killed By Squirrel
item.description:
@Killed_By_Squirrel wrote:

T3h Ultra Bk:

I use the web moparscape. I can’t download MS because I’m not an admin on my PC. So that could be a reason why?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 10:22:52 PM[/size][hr]Bumped…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 10:36:01 PM[/size][hr]Again, bumped.

It means server is down. Also, you’re not aloud to “bump” on these forums, for it is against the rules, which apparently you didn’t read.

Read full topic

item.title: Always Error Message
item.dc:creator: @ILIKECEAREL ILIKECEAREL
item.description:
@ILIKECEAREL wrote:

Well that happened to me.What i did was just start moparscape that gets put on your desktop instead of going into the file where you putted all those files and clicking runmoparscape.If that doesn’t work then you might need a newer version of java that you can download.

Read full topic
